message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $18000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of something a bit more reasonable. Would you be willing to consider $15000?

I understand you're looking for a more reasonable price, Bob. However, I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $16500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for the counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $16000?

I'm glad we're close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $17000. This is the lowest I can go, so I hope you can make it work.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. Would you consider $16500?

I understand you're trying to find a middle ground, Bob. However, I've already made a significant concession and I'm not willing to go any lower than $17000. I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal - I'll include a premium service package worth $1000. Would you be willing to meet me at $17000?
I appreciate the added value of the premium service package, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $16750, but that's as high as I can go.

I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. I'll sell you the product for $17200, and I'll also throw in the premium service package worth $1000. This is my absolute final offer. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to explore other options.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm afraid I'm still not comfortable with the price. I've gone as high as I can, and I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I'll have to look elsewhere for a better option.
